post_title: FS: 2 PSA 1 commons Piedmont 150 for sale
post_content:
Kriger & Turner both SOLD

Will listen to offers on the remaining two. Full disclosure, paid $100 for each from an auction house, asking $75 for each, or $140 for both combined, and will pay for shipping. 

Feel free to text at 719-757-0008

Or email at [url]jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url]

Can get these shipped today, or in the morning via FedEx. Colorado Springs shipping hub is right by my place.
Feel free to make offers as well individually or for all four. I am only going after Piedmont 150 portraits, and moving inventory!!!!
